titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend for an additional year the taxable income limit on percentage depletion for oil and natural gas from marginal wells.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/3/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the suspension of the taxable income limitation on percentage depletion for oil and natural gas produced from marginal properties.
